title: OnePlus Y1S 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV  (43FD2A00)

product_specification.In The Box: 1n Television Set, 2N AAA Battery, 2N Stand Base, 4N Screws, 1N Manual & Warranty Card, 1N Remote Controller
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty and Additional 1 Year on Panel Provided By the Manufacturer From Date of Purchase
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. InThe cost of wall mount is Rs. 399 (inclusive of applicable taxes) for display size>43" and Rs. 299 (inclusive of applicable taxes) for display size=32" and 43" and will be available with service engineer for purchase.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.AI-driven Visuals: Featuring a modern Gamma Engine, the OnePlus TV maximises the quality by tweaking the image to enhance clarity and ensuring that the visuals look true-to-life. With its vivid colours and dynamic contrast, this TV lets you enjoy engrossing visuals.
product_description.Excellent Audio: Equipped with speakers that render adequate output, this TV provides crisp high-definition audio. The sound quality is enhanced by Dolby Audio so that you can experience clear and immersive sound in every scene.

review:
VERY NICE PRODUCT..
THANKS FLIPKART FOR GOOD SERVICE.

INSTALLATION FROM JEEVES NEEDS TO BE CHECKED BY FLIPKART..HE OVERCHARGED FOR TV MOUNT/SUPPORT STAND ..!

OVERALL PRODUCT IS GOOD WITH NICE PICTURE QUALITY

This 32" 80cm 1+ Y1s 2022 model Led tv is worth of money just simply buy it without any doubt.
Dolby Sound, Display and apps accessibility are top notch.

I love this TV because of it's loud but also sustainable audio quality and good picture quality.
Also it has a very good ui along with a shortcut key on the remote.
Picture quality and design very good and latest Android 11 works good in it . Good speakers pretty much loud ..
Fast service Thank u flipkart Very good quality and nice product

It's amazing by design but as pathetic as the other 32" LEDs in performance. The interface is good, picture quality is okay but takes a lot of time in switching apps and starting up. Overall it's an okay TV if you are patient enough.
